00029 RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::XIdentWindow()
00030                     :Fl_Window( 800, 600, "xIdent : Identification "
00031                                 "Protocol maintenance tool") {
00032 
00033   begin();
00034 
00035     // The bottom buttons
00036     Fl_Button* btnExit=new Fl_Button(20, 560, 100, 30, "Exit");
00037     Fl_Button* btnRefresh=new Fl_Button(680, 560, 100, 30, "Refresh");
00038 
00039     playerList=new PlayerList( 10, 110, 780, 260 );
00040 
00041     ServerList* serverList=new ServerList( 10, 110+280, 780, 160 );
00042 
00043   end();
00044 
00045   btnExit->callback(cbExit, this);
00046 }

00051 RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::~XIdentWindow(){
00052   playerList=NULL;

00058 void RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::cbExit(Fl_Widget *w, void *f){
00059   ( (XIdentWindow*)f )->i_cbExit(); 
00060 }

00066 void RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::i_cbExit(){
00067   LOGI("Exit callback called");
00068   this->hide();
00069 }
00070 
00076 void RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::showIdentError(tIdentReturn i){
00077 
00078    const char* msg;
00079    switch (i){
00080 
00081    case TIR_FAILED_LOGIN:
00082      msg="The FTP login failed";
00083      break;
00084 
00085    case TIR_FAILED_LOCK:
00086      msg="The lock process failed";
00087      break;
00088 
00089    case TIR_FAILED_UNLOCK:
00090      msg="The unlock process failed";
00091      break;
00092 
00093    case TIR_ALREADY_LOCK:
00094      msg="The file is already locked";
00095      break;
00096  
00097    case TIR_FAILED_CHDIR:
00098      msg="A chdir command failed";
00099      break;
00100 
00101    case TIR_FAILED_TRANSFER:
00102      msg="The FTP transfer of the file failed";
00103      break;
00104 
00105    case TIR_FAILED_OPEN:
00106      msg="The connection can not be opened";
00107      break;
00108  
00109    case TIR_FAILED_CLOSE:
00110      msg="The connection can not be closed";
00111      break;
00112  
00113    case TIR_UNKNOWN_ERROR:
00114      msg="An unknown error occurs";
00115      break;
00116    }
00117    fl_alert(msg);
00118 
00119  }

00127 void RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::cbGetPlayer(Fl_Widget *w, void *f){
00128   ( (XIdentWindow*)f )->i_cbGetPlayer(); 
00129 }
